DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Human Herpesvirus 8 Viral Load Negation Collection Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Reason why the specimen for human herpesvirus 8 viral load was not collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Specimen Human Herpesvirus 8 Viral Load Negation Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A gammaherpesvirus that contributes to the development of Kaposi sarcoma._The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._The number of viral particles (usually HIV) in a sample of blood plasma._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
